testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "test@example1006717.com" field........................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd"........................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "valid" "test@example1006717.com" and "P@ssw0rd".......passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "invalid" "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"...........passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_currencies | users could change the website currency to Euro
testcase.name: user could change products currency to Euro
testcase.system-out: Given user changed currency to "Euro".......................................passed Then homepage products are changed to "Euro"................................passed

testcase.classname: F04_Search | user can search for products using the search bar
testcase.name: user could search using product name
testcase.system-out: Given user enters the "book" in search bar..................................passed When user clicks on search button...........................................passed Then search results page opens..............................................passed And every product in search page related to "book"..........................passed

testcase.classname: F05_hoverCategories | user can hover on the main categories and click on sub categories
testcase.name: user can hover on Electronics menu and go to Cell phones sub category
testcase.system-out: Given user hovers on "Electronics" main category............................passed When user clicks on "Cell phones" sub category..............................passed Then "Cell phones" page is opened...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F06_homeSliders | user can click on home sliders to go to
testcase.name: user can click on Nokia Lumia 1020 slider to go to the product page
testcase.failure:
Given user clicks on "Nokia Lumia 1020" slider..............................passed Then "Nokia Lumia 1020" page opens..........................................failed
